name: The Last Game Standing
description:
An Fps Shooter where you are the last game on the planet after the government has banned video games and only you can stop them.

Gun asset got from http://devassets.com/

Gun Sound from http://soundbible.com/1804-M4A1-Single.ht

The target is to get to the flag at the end of the level

Update: Added Death and Win screens not originally in the game jam release even though it says game jam edition nothing will be added new to that version, Instead I am going to work on making a more polished version which will be released at a later date.

Controls:

WASD for movement forwards backwards and sideways

Move the mouse to look around

Left Mouse Button to Shoot
